Reviews.Title: “Rooms are ok, location not city center”
Reviews.Author: dyt44
Reviews.Content: Rooms are ok. Basic, clean, bright. Breakfast was good but location isn't city center. Good for short stay.

Reviews.Title: “OK if you need it for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: miroma
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel for its proximity to the airport. In fact, it is a certain distance away but you can easily get there from the airport – take bus No.128, which stops near terminal A, get off at Holländerstr./Aroser Allee, and you will see the hotel right across the road. The bus ride takes 15 minutes, and the bus comes every ten minutes on average. My room was spacious, with a desk, a big wardrobe, a coffee table, and a small outdated Gründig TV with only German channels available. The bathroom with a shower was very clean. The hotel offers free wi-fi access, which is not so common in German hotels (don’t forget to get a password at the reception). Breakfast was standard but quite good quality. If you don’t feel like paying 8 euros for it, there is a kitchenette in the room, which can be fully equipped at your request, and the LIDL supermarket just a couple of minutes’ walk away (which works until 8:00 p.m.) All things considered, I would give the hotel 3 stars, and I think it is OK for a short stay and if you have to be close to the airport. However, if you like peace and quiet, think twice before you book a room there as your sleep might be disturbed by the planes landing and taking off at the nearby airport virtually every 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “It was a bit of a disappointment”
Reviews.Author: Bernie_Von
Reviews.Content: I consider this hotel an average 2 star hotel Too far from the airport. Poor neighborhood. No shopping nearby. The taxi ride for the 6km from the airport, and the trip back, cost 35 Euro. The not included breakfast for 2 came to 16 Euro. If we had added these charges, we could have stayed at a much better hotel right at the airport. The hotel needs upgrading. The breakfast room was very noisy. All in all, I do not recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “This is NOT at or near the airport!”
Reviews.Author: mbiz
Reviews.Content: Very, very deceptive, because of the name, but a 20 - 30 minute cab ride from Tegel Airport depending on the time of the day in an obscure neighborhood with NOTHING nearby. Hotel for tour buses mainly, but slow check in even if no one around. Free wifi is good. Did not have a chance to sample the breakfast. Relatively spartan rooms for the price and a noisy courtyard restaurant. Bathroom was clean, but not up to par. For the same price, get a much better room in the center, only 5 euros more cab ride from the airport, but restaurants, shops, things nearby. Savvy business travelers avoid!

Reviews.Title: “Good Quality for a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: anyamarya
Reviews.Content: Good location, bus station just by the Hotel (bus no 128 from/to TXL (*around 15-20 mins), with a stop at Kurt Schumaher where you can jump to U-Bahn and get around entire city). Breakfast was extremely good with loads of choices from fruits to hot buffet. Very helpful staff. There was only one thing i was dissatisfied with - no aircondition, which can be very annoying during hot nights, open window can hardly help. A big plus for a kitchenette, where you got microwave, fridge, cooker, pans etc :) So you can enjoy even long stay and dont have to worry about diner late at night ;) To sum up I would love to stay there again if happens to me to visit Berlin again. Aha, I forgot - there is a free WiFi internet access!

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably-priced hotel with easy airport access”
Reviews.Author: maestrolms
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for three nights on a recent trip to Berlin I moved out here because my previous hotel was having problems with its Internet access; when I arrived here, I found that high-speed WiFi was FREE, which is somewhat rare outside the US. Not only that, but an excellent breakfast buffet was also FREE, at least at the time I was staying, in mid-December. I paid about 64 Euros per night for a good-sized room with two twin beds, and found it to be an excellent value The hotel is located on the #128 bus line, which runs between the Osloer Strasse U-Bahn station and Tegel airport, with 24-hour service of 10-15 minute frequency. I found that a week-long Transposrt Pass, for 24 Euros, was an excellent value for my travels around the city, which has an OUTSTANDING public transportation system.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for given price”
Reviews.Author: ablazkova
Reviews.Content: We were generally very satisfied with our stay. Room was clean, bathroom was really nice. The staff at the reception was helpful. If you are traveling with car they have a free parking right next to the hotel. Subway station is 10 min walk, so very easy accesible. Breakfast excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: AnfiHemma
Reviews.Content: A nice hotel. Friendly staff, Great breakfast with everything. Nice outside patio to sit eating breakfast. Big room. good beds. Warm in august no ac. Aeroplanes luds (near the airport). DIrect bus to airport. Calm neigboorhood. Close to the tube... direct to Alexanderplatz.

Reviews.Title: “A good place to stay close to Tegel Airport”
Reviews.Author: CamoFlash
Reviews.Content: The stay was a pleasant experience. The room were nice and clean. The staff was polite and helpful. This is not necessarily always the case in hotels in good old Germany. The breakfast was good and tasty - soooo much better than any hotel breakfast here in the US of A. Since the hotel is close to Tegel airport, the sound of the landing airplanes is audible – but not too noisy. While the hotel itself has no airport shuttle, the public airport bus stops very close to the hotel. Not a hotel for a vacation stay, but a good over-night stop from or to Tegel airport.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MaciejZ
Reviews.Content: We stayed there a few days at the end of May. Pretty satisfied with the hotel. It is affordable, conveniently situated not far from the airport and to the bus lines. The bus stop is just behind the corner (line 128 will take you to Franz-Neuman Pl where you can jump on a subway). The service we received was far above average. The staff was very helpful and kind. The rooms, although relatively small were clean and well equipped. The 2 only things that would be handy were: a microwave and an ice machine. Breakfast – included in the price (at least when we stayed) – it was a fest not a breakfast – variety of cheeses, sausages, fruit, bakery and what’s not. Much better than standard cereal and stale donuts. The only thing to improve – internet access. There is a spot in the lobby with a public computer. But charging for access? Come on, it is year 2008. Who else on this planet still charges for the net? Overall – I’d recommend to any one.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kingalric
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a convenient location and the quality of rooms is definitely good. I spent 2 nights at this hotel and I found the staff to be helpful and friendly. You can take a bus number 128 from just 50m outside the hotel and that gets you to Kurt-Schumacher U-Bahn station. From there on, its only a 12-14 min train ride to Freidrich Strasse (one of the centers of Berlin Mitte). The buses run every 10 min till 9pm I guess and after that it is every 20 min. Overall, this hotel is a good place. This place is also close to the Tegel Airport in Berlin. A tip: This hotel has a Berlin Package (2 nights, double room + breakfast) for 66 euros a night. This is a good price. Check the hotel webpage for more details. Also, do not forget to get the Berlin city card (14 odd euros for 48 hrs). This is very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: luvtravelinNJ
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for 1 night since we had a very early flight out of the Berlin Tegel Aiport. We therefore wanted something very close by so we could easily get to the airport. One thing that this hotel falsely claims is that is is 2 KM away from the airport. That might be a radial distance (through grass and fields). But if you are a normal person taking a car, taxi or bus - the route from the airport to the hotel will take abour 15-20 minutes. It is not too bad - as long as you are aware of this. The bus stop is at the corner of the street only a few yards from the hotel. The rooms of the hotel are adequate. They are large, the beds are comfortable, the bathroom is clean. Breakfast is also included and is really nice - they've got a huge assortment of food which includes hot and cold breakfas items. If you are like us and just a need a night to stay to be close to the airport - this is a economicaly wise decision. Please see our photos for more info.

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Hotel Berlin Tegel
HotelInfo.Address: Hollander Strasse 31, 13407 Berlin, Germany
